title: MUFG's Brown: Biggest Risk is Italian Banking Meltdown (Audio)
itunes:title: MUFG's Brown: Biggest Risk is Italian Banking Meltdown (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Brendan Brown, Chief Economist at MUFG, discusses why Brexit is the start of a European journey away from the failure of the EU.
